text:
Hi I am facing an issue  I am on settings>properties page
when i export all properties from here one particular property json is not closed fully
It has almost 450 values in the dropdown
To avoid parsing error I manually closing the ending brackets,also HubSpot is not providing all values in the dropdown

Hello, I have a really stupid issue. I'm pretty new to CLI and I wonder, how do I upload files? And yes, I follow the CLI guide, but when I use my Visual Studio Code, I keep getting [ERROR] `src` is a module path but `dest` is not. What do I do wrong with the destination? What should be included in it? I'm working in folder that is already authenticated, so I use something simple as /My_Theme/modules, which is copied path from  the design manager. Thank you for your help :slightly_smiling_face:

I am working on the HubSpot Data Sourcing project. I am trying to use the Analytics API to get all the campaign data and related metrics, but when I want to use the daily time period instead of the total, it requires me to use an additional filter, but I do not want to filter the data further.

In the documentation, it is not clear how to use the filter option clearly and what are all the options, so I tried to use a dummy filter like *&f=true* to call the API, but it returns an empty result. I just want to get the same result as the total one, but in the daily format. Below, you can find the 2 requests that I am using. I am looking forward to cooperating, thank you!

<https://api.hubapi.com/analytics/v2/reports/utm-campaigns/total?hapikey=MYKEY&start=20220101&end=20220601>

Above request works well but it shows the result in the total format.

<https://api.hubapi.com/analytics/v2/reports/utm-campaigns/daily?hapikey=MYKEY&start=20220101&end=20220601&f=googleadwords_int>

Above query works well too, but I want to get the results for all the campaigns instead of filtering with only one campaign.

Link of the documentation: <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/analytics/get-analytics-data-breakdowns>

Hello
calling functionality available in HubSpot?
like we did call button to make a call in ticket detail page?
Hi all, I need to create a task with API, but I did not find a way to create it with a reminder, any suggestions? I'm using the v3 API version

Hey team,

I've had a quick browse through the community and can see multiple posts on this.

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Deals-Automatically-Associate-A-Consecutive-Number-To-Each-New/idi-p/15770/page/2#comments>

Creating a sequential unique ID number for each record, is this theoretically possible through a custom code action? Use case my end is to create a credit ID number for tickets. It has to be 6 characters long for use in other systems and be presentable to a customer HS0001, HS0002, etc

Is there any way or suggested workaround to be able to upload a file to HubSpot — but by providing a URL to the file,  not uploading the file contents directly?
(<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/files/files|POST files/v3/files> seems to require the file contents)
:crossed_fingers: thanks in advance!
Actually, `POST /files/v3/files/import-from-url/async`  appears to exist.. it’s just not mention on the API docs “overview” tab — just the “endpoints” tab. Confusing, but looks promising

Hello everyone

I'm pretty new around HubSpot and i'm sorry if this was already answered before. But i would like to create some line items using this endpoint `/crm/v3/objects/line_items` making the requests on my custom module. The problem is that i'm running into some CORS errors, is there any other solution besides creating my own backend to run this requests?
What have you found in the docs so far? I haven’t worked with emails yet, and I’m not sure I understand your problem

Hi everyone

Is it possible to retrieve the actual content of a page via the API? Or some other ways?

Hello friends..!
I would like to create xml file every time a new page is published. those xml files will be used in google search console. My question is how to get all the list pages and update on every new page publish ?

Hi team :) I’m using api method PUT `marketing-emails/v1/emails/:id` trying to set “abTestId” to null (needed to detach cloned email from original A/B test group). Now i’m receiving error `"Changing the abTestId is not allowed."`, but i think this was working some time ago. Can you please advice, how needed behaviour can achieved (clone A/B email and make it not A/B)? Thanks much for your attention
